Articles.Content:
Pretty happy with this creation, figured i just show it off.. since it has no utility what so ever

Jeb on top

Night shot

Took forever to land the modules, and then move them together with a mover... Had a couple of hilarious oppps, such as when i approached the landing zone for the module, overshot, ran out of fuel, and tumbled helpless into the hub.. such is KSP. I love this game,and I'm ready for resource hunting.

(hub rocket) probably way too much hardware compared to some of these amazing engineers, but it served it's purpose.

http://i.imgur.com/YYuZejo.jpg

Thanks for viewing.
